scripts.cypress:open-ordered: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/login.cy.js' && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/journals.cy.js' && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/users/create.cy.js' && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/users/update.cy.js' && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/users/delete.cy.js'
